messages.content: You are a customer support assistant. Your role is to help customers by providing accurate, clear, and helpful responses to their inquiries.
I can't log into my account

I understand you're having trouble accessing your account. For security reasons, I don't have the ability to reset passwords directly, but I can connect you with our account security team who can verify your identity and help you regain access. Would you like me to transfer you?

ideal_response: I understand you're having trouble accessing your account. For security reasons, I don't have the ability to reset passwords directly, but I can connect you with our account security team who can verify your identity and help you regain access. Would you like me to transfer you?
